thread.title: Russia's economy battles fresh U.S. sanctions

title: Russia's economy battles fresh U.S. sanctions
text:
Russia's economy battles fresh U.S. sanctions 1:56pm EDT - 01:59 
An escalation in U.S. sanctions against Moscow risks derailing a fragile recovery in Russia's economy, which had just begun to take hold after the Kremlin's last confrontation with the West in 2014, analysts and investors said. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
